component.name: Wrye Bash
component.summary: A swiss army knife for modding Bethesda games

description.p: Wrye Bash is a mod management utility for games based on Bethesda's Creation Engine, with a rich set of features. This is a fork of the Wrye Bash related code from the SVN 3177 trunk revision. We are in the process of refactoring the code to eventually support more games, offering the same feature set for all of them. Please see our Contributing.md if interested in contributing.
Here is a list of supported games with the minimal patch version that Bash was tested on (previous versions or latest versions may or may not work):

ul.li: #697: Clean Data fails with an error when moving files [Utumno]
#694: Wrye Bash fails to extract faces from saves in Oblivion [Utumno]
#689: Work around MO2's VFS breaking newer versions of WB [Infernio]
#580: Improve handling of renames, fix bugs [Utumno]
